contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: DVC is 100% open source. We welcome contributions to our code and docs.

events.title: Events
events.description: Learn more about DVC and meet our team virtually or in person! We're appearing at conferences, meetups, and talks around the world.
events.mobileDescription: Come to hear more about DVC

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: There are many ways to learn about DVC: check out our documentation, our blogs and monthly Heartbeats, recommended reads, and more.

meet.title: Community
meet.description: Ask questions, find answers, and connect with the DVC community.

documentation.title: Tutorials
documentation.description: Step-by-step introduction to basic DVC features

userContent.title: Building an ML Platform from Scratch: Live Coding Session
userContent.author: Alon Gubkin

userContent.title: Reflinks vs Symlinks vs Hard Links, and How They Can Help Machine Learning Projects
userContent.author: David Herron

events.title: DVC Learn Meetup - Getting Started with Data Version Control
events.description: At this first session of DVC Learn, you will learn the about the importance of reporducibility and how to get started using DVC.

events.title: ML Summit Berlin
events.description: Milecia McGregor will present Using Reproducible Experiments to Create Better Models with DVC

events.title: DVC October Office Hours - MLOps Tool Stack and Internal Kaggle Competition!
events.description: Hear from two Community members on how they use DVC and CML - one with geo-spatial data projects and the other creating an internal Kaggle competition for solving fraud detection problems

events.title: All Things Open Conference
events.description: Milecia McGregor presents Using Reproducible Experiements to Create Better Models with DVC.

events.title: DVC Learn Meetup - Getting Started - Experiments
events.description: In this second lesson, you will learn all about getting started with DVC Experiments.  Join us to learn and meet others learning DVC.

events.title: Scale by the Bay
events.description: Milecia McGregor will present at Scale by the Bay Conference on Using Reproducible Experiments to Create Better Models

events.title: PyData Global
events.description: Milecia McGregor presents on Using Reproducible Experiments to Create Better Machine Learning Models

events.title: DVC Learn Meetup - Getting Started - Sharing Experiments
events.description: In this final lesson, you will learn all about how to get started sharing experiments with your team.  Join us to learn and meet others learning DVC.

events.title: ODSC West
events.description: Milecia McGregor will present at ODSC West on Using Reproducible Experiments to Create Better Models.

events.title: DataArt IT NonStop Conference
events.description: Milecia McGregor will present on Tuning Hyperparameters with Reproducible Experiments.
